description: Returns information about the state of a pipeline, including the stages and actions.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the pipeline about which you want to get information.

nested_items.name: pipelineName
nested_items.description: The name of the pipeline for which you want to get the state.

nested_items.name: pipelineVersion
nested_items.description: The version number of the pipeline.

nested_items.name: stageStates
nested_items.description: A list of the pipeline stage output information, including stage name, state, most recent run details, whether the stage is disabled, and other data.

nested_items.name: stageName
nested_items.description: The name of the stage.

nested_items.name: inboundExecution
nested_items.description: Represents information about the run of a stage.

nested_items.name: pipelineExecutionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the pipeline execution associated with the stage.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the stage, or for a completed stage, the last status of the stage.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of pipeline execution for the stage, such as a rollback pipeline execution.

nested_items.name: inboundExecutions
nested_items.description: The inbound executions for a stage.

nested_items.name: pipelineExecutionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the pipeline execution associated with the stage.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the stage, or for a completed stage, the last status of the stage.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of pipeline execution for the stage, such as a rollback pipeline execution.

nested_items.name: inboundTransitionState
nested_items.description: The state of the inbound transition, which is either enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Whether the transition between stages is enabled (true) or disabled (false).

nested_items.name: lastChangedBy
nested_items.description: The ID of the user who last changed the transition state.

nested_items.name: lastChangedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the transition state was last changed.

nested_items.name: disabledReason
nested_items.description: The user-specified reason why the transition between two stages of a pipeline was disabled.

nested_items.name: actionStates
nested_items.description: The state of the stage.

nested_items.name: actionName
nested_items.description: The name of the action.

nested_items.name: currentRevision
nested_items.description: Represents information about the version (or revision) of an action.

nested_items.name: revisionId
nested_items.description: The system-generated unique ID that identifies the revision number of the action.

nested_items.name: revisionChangeId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the change that set the state to this revision (for example, a deployment ID or timestamp).

nested_items.name: created
nested_items.description: The date and time when the most recent version of the action was created, in timestamp format.

nested_items.name: latestExecution
nested_items.description: Represents information about the run of an action.

nested_items.name: actionExecutionId
nested_items.description: ID of the workflow action execution in the current stage. Use the  GetPipelineState action to retrieve the current action execution details of the current stage.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the action, or for a completed action, the last status of the action.

nested_items.name: summary
nested_items.description: A summary of the run of the action.

nested_items.name: lastStatusChange
nested_items.description: The last status change of the action.

nested_items.name: token
nested_items.description: The system-generated token used to identify a unique approval request. The token for each open approval request can be obtained using the GetPipelineState command. It is used to validate that the approval request corresponding to this token is still valid.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedBy
nested_items.description: The ARN of the user who last changed the pipeline.

nested_items.name: externalExecutionId
nested_items.description: The external ID of the run of the action.

nested_items.name: externalExecutionUrl
nested_items.description: The URL of a resource external to Amazon Web Services that is used when running the action (for example, an external repository URL).

nested_items.name: percentComplete
nested_items.description: A percentage of completeness of the action as it runs.

nested_items.name: errorDetails
nested_items.description: The details of an error returned by a URL external to Amazon Web Services.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The system ID or number code of the error.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The text of the error message.

nested_items.name: logStreamARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the log stream for the action compute.

nested_items.name: entityUrl
nested_items.description: A URL link for more information about the state of the action, such as a deployment group details page.

nested_items.name: revisionUrl
nested_items.description: A URL link for more information about the revision, such as a commit details page.

nested_items.name: latestExecution
nested_items.description: Information about the latest execution in the stage, including its ID and status.

nested_items.name: pipelineExecutionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the pipeline execution associated with the stage.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the stage, or for a completed stage, the last status of the stage.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of pipeline execution for the stage, such as a rollback pipeline execution.

nested_items.name: beforeEntryConditionState
nested_items.description: The state of the entry conditions for a stage.

nested_items.name: latestExecution
nested_items.description: Represents information about the latest run of a condition for a stage.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of a run of a condition for a stage.

nested_items.name: summary
nested_items.description: A summary of the run of the condition for a stage.

nested_items.name: conditionStates
nested_items.description: The states of the conditions for a run of a condition for a stage.

nested_items.name: latestExecution
nested_items.description: The state of the latest run of the rule.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the run for a condition.

nested_items.name: summary
nested_items.description: The summary of information about a run for a condition.

nested_items.name: lastStatusChange
nested_items.description: The last status change of the condition.

nested_items.name: ruleStates
nested_items.description: The state of the rules for the condition.

nested_items.name: ruleName
nested_items.description: The name of the rule.

nested_items.name: currentRevision
nested_items.description: The ID of the current revision of the artifact successfully worked on by the job.

nested_items.name: revisionId
nested_items.description: The system-generated unique ID that identifies the revision number of the rule.

nested_items.name: revisionChangeId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the change that set the state to this revision (for example, a deployment ID or timestamp).

nested_items.name: created
nested_items.description: The date and time when the most recent version of the rule was created, in timestamp format.

nested_items.name: latestExecution
nested_items.description: Represents information about the latest run of an rule.

nested_items.name: ruleExecutionId
nested_items.description: The execution ID for the run of the rule.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the run of the rule, such as FAILED.

nested_items.name: summary
nested_items.description: A summary of the run of the rule.

nested_items.name: lastStatusChange
nested_items.description: The last status change of the rule.

nested_items.name: token
nested_items.description: The system-generated token used to identify a unique request.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedBy
nested_items.description: The ARN of the user who last changed the rule.

nested_items.name: externalExecutionId
nested_items.description: The external ID of the run of the rule.

nested_items.name: externalExecutionUrl
nested_items.description: The URL of a resource external to Amazon Web Services that is used when running the rule (for example, an external repository URL).

nested_items.name: errorDetails
nested_items.description: Represents information about an error in CodePipeline.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The system ID or number code of the error.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The text of the error message.

nested_items.name: entityUrl
nested_items.description: A URL link for more information about the state of the action, such as a details page.

nested_items.name: revisionUrl
nested_items.description: A URL link for more information about the revision, such as a commit details page.

nested_items.name: onSuccessConditionState
nested_items.description: The state of the success conditions for a stage.

nested_items.name: latestExecution
nested_items.description: Represents information about the latest run of a condition for a stage.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of a run of a condition for a stage.

nested_items.name: summary
nested_items.description: A summary of the run of the condition for a stage.

nested_items.name: conditionStates
nested_items.description: The states of the conditions for a run of a condition for a stage.

nested_items.name: status

nested_items.name: revisionChangeId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the change that set the state to this revision (for example, a deployment ID or timestamp).

nested_items.name: created
nested_items.description: The date and time when the most recent version of the rule was created, in timestamp format.

nested_items.name: revisionUrl

nested_items.name: retryStageMetadata
nested_items.description: he details of a specific automatic retry on stage failure, including the attempt number and trigger.

nested_items.name: autoStageRetryAttempt
nested_items.description: The number of attempts for a specific stage with automatic retry on stage failure. One attempt is allowed for automatic stage retry on failure.

nested_items.name: manualStageRetryAttempt
nested_items.description: The number of attempts for a specific stage where manual retries have been made upon stage failure.

nested_items.name: latestRetryTrigger
nested_items.description: The latest trigger for a specific stage where manual or automatic retries have been made upon stage failure.

nested_items.name: created
nested_items.description: The date and time the pipeline was created, in timestamp format.

nested_items.name: updated
nested_items.description: The date and time the pipeline was last updated, in timestamp format.
